plugin.name: Repeat_Command
plugin.author: Nick Gammon
plugin.description:
To use, type:
#n command
This sends "command" n times to the MUD.
For example:
#3 kick kobold

alias.send:
-- check at least 1 repeat if %1 < 1 then Note("Too few repeats specified (%1)") return end -- if
-- check not more than 1000 repeats if %1 > 1000 then Note("Too many repeats specified (%1)") return end -- if
-- execute (send to command processor) the command for i = 1, %1 do Execute "%2" end -- for loop
